verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}"If it die" hear the message Falling from thy Lord "If it die" much fruit it beareth 'Tis thy Savior's word{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Would'st thou see life work in others Thou thyself must die Fall into the ground be burried Low in darkness lie{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}But He leaves thee not in darkness Light shall greet thine eyes And in glad new life and glory He shall bid thee rise{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Dost thou crave to tread the pathway And His life to share As thou passest thru death's gateway He will meet thee there{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thou shalt learn the blessed secret He shall live that dies From a life poured out in secret Shall a harvest rise{/lang-eng}
